TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PromptBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 建立空的 物件，並提供方法來加入內容、選取語音、控制語音屬性，以及控制口語發音。

span.span: Creates an empty object and provides methods for adding content, selecting voices, controlling voice attributes, and controlling the pronunciation of spoken words.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與，您可以加入各種不同的內容類型加入至的提示字元，包括純文字、 SSML 標記 （做為字串或檔案），錄製音訊，或甚至是另一個物件。With , you can add a variety of content types to a prompt, including plain text, SSML markup (as a string or a file), recorded audio, or even another object. 要附加至文字物件，並選擇性地控制語音屬性，例如強調、 速率和音量，請使用其中一種方法。To append text to a object and optionally control voice attributes such as emphasis, rate, and volume, use one of the methods. 您也可以控制語音屬性，為群組和方法。You can also control voice attributes as a group with the and methods. 您可以將文字附加及控制講話內容或它 phishing 英文發音如使用如何， ， ， ，或方法。You can append text and control what is spoken or how it is pronounced using the , , , , or methods. 變更目前選取的讀出語音在提示字元中使用其中一個多載需要語音特性，例如年齡和性別命名特定的聲音，來使用，或指定的方法。Change the currently selected speaking voice in the prompt using one of the overloaded methods, naming a specific voice to use or specifying required voice characteristics, such as age and gender. 若要產生的語音功能物件，您可以將它做為引數中傳遞方法。To generate speech from a object, you can pass it as an argument to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[建構複雜提示](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4)。For more information, see [Constructing a Complex Prompt](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/552cb356-7344-473e-b0f2-7a9983f8c1a4).

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供特定文化特性的相關資訊，例如文化特性的語言、文化特性的名稱、書寫系統、使用的行事曆，以及如何格式化日期和排序字串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as its language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體，並指定文化特性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies a culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定的值屬性。This constructor sets the value for the property. 物件將嘗試選取支援所指定的語言已安裝的語音`culture`處理提示的參數。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to process the prompt. 如果找到具有指定之文化特性的語音，它會使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到與指定的文化特性的語音，就會使用預設語音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要正確讀出中所指定的語言的字`culture`必須安裝參數，語音合成 （語音或 TTS） 引擎，支援的語言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安裝的 TTS 引擎會呼叫語音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要取得特定文化特性語音已安裝相關的資訊，請使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼的值為`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 隨附於 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支援下列語言的國家/地區代碼：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英文 （美國）English (United States) - zh-chs 和 CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中國）Chinese (China) - zh-chs 和 TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台灣）Chinese (Taiwan) 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，並指定其。The example that follows creates a instance and specifies its . ```csharp using System.Speech.Synthesis; public void MySimpleText () { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(new System.Globalization.CultureInfo("en-US")); builder.AppendText("Hello world!"); } ``` 下列標記會顯示對等的 SSML:The following markup shows the equivalent SSML: ```xml Hello world! ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendSsmlMarkup(string ssmlMarkup) cil managed

param.name: ssmlMarkup
param.span: 字串，包含 SSML 標記。

span.span: A string containing SSML markup.

summary.span: 將包含 SSML 標記的指定字串附加至 物件。

span.span: Appends the specified string containing SSML markup to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當附加 SSML 標記時，您必須使用正確的逸出字元。You must use the appropriate escape characters when appending SSML markup. 請注意回溯斜線前面封入的值的引號`interpret-as`在下列範例中的屬性：Notice the backward-slashes preceding the quotation marks enclosing the value of the `interpret-as` attribute in the following example: ```csharp builder.AppendSsmlMarkup(" chair "); ``` > [!NOTE] > 用來做為引數的字串不能包含`speak`項目。The string used as an argument to cannot include a `speak` element. 當使用指定中的內嵌發音`phoneme`項目，您可以使用從下列注音字母，提供目前的語音引擎支援它的任何電話：When using to specify inline pronunciations in a `phoneme` element, you can use phones from any of the following phonetic alphabets, provided that the current speech engine supports it: - 國際音標 (IPA)International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) - 通用電話組 (UPS)Universal Phone Set (UPS) - SAPI 電話設定SAPI Phone Set 任何 SSML 相容的語音引擎將從國際音標語音電話。Any SSML-compliant speech engine will speak phones from the IPA. 您也可以將附加檔案，包含 SSML 標記使用其中一種方法。You can also append a file containing SSML markup using one of the methods. 若要附加要說出文字的格式不是標記語言，使用其中一種， ， ，或方法。To append text to be spoken that is not formatted with markup language, use one of the , , , or methods.

summary.span: 將文字附加至 物件。

span.span: Appends text to the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AppendText(string textToSpeak) cil managed

param.span: 字串，包含要讀出的文字。

span.span: Specifies text to append to the object.

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the degree of emphasis for the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 中的語音合成引擎不支援這一次的強調參數。The speech synthesis engines in Windows do not support the emphasis parameter at this time. 設定強調參數的值將會產生任何可發出聲音的變更合成的語音輸出中。Setting values for the emphasis parameter will produce no audible change in the synthesized speech output.

span.span: A string containing the text to be spoken.

param.name: rate
param.span: 要套用至文字的讀出速率值。

span.span: The value for the speaking rate to apply to the text.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendTextWithAlias (string textToSpeak, string substitute);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendTextWithAlias(string textToSpeak, string substitute) cil managed
Public Sub AppendTextWithAlias (textToSpeak As String, substitute As String)
public: void AppendTextWithAlias(System::String ^ textToSpeak, System::String ^ substitute);

param.name: textToSpeak
param.span: 字串，包含文字表示。

span.span: A string containing the text representation.

param.name: substitute
param.span: 字串，包含要讀出的文字。

span.span: A string containing the text to be spoken.

summary.span: 將文字附加至 物件，並指定要讀出的別名文字來取代附加文字。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the alias text to be spoken in place of the appended text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這可讓文件中包含語音和撰寫的表單的提示。This allows a document to contain both a spoken and a written form for a prompt. 例如，書寫的形式可以是縮略字，例如 SAPI，而且出口語的形式可能是展開的縮略字，在此案例語音應用程式開發介面中的文字。For example, the written form could be an acronym, such as SAPI, and the spoken form could be the expanded text for the acronym, in this case Speech Application Programming Interface. ## Examples 下列範例會將文字字串 （"語音合成標記語言 」） 和其別名 ("SSML 」) 附加至物件。The following example appends a text string ("Speech Synthesis Markup Language") and its alias ("SSML") to a object. 合成器將發出的"S S M L"音。The synthesizer will pronounce "S S M L". ``` PromptBuilder alias = new PromptBuilder(); alias.AppendTextWithAlias("Speech Synthesis Markup Language","SSML"); ```

summary.span: 將文字附加至 物件，並指定文字的內容類型。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the content type of the text.

param.span: 文字的內容類型。

span.span: The content type of the text.

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the content type using a member of the enumeration.

param.span: 字串，包含要讀出的文字。

span.span: A string containing the text to be spoken.

param.name: sayAs
param.span: 文字的內容類型。

span.span: The content type of the text.

summary.span: 將文字附加至 物件及指定文字內容類型的 。

span.span: Appends text to the object and a that specifies the content type of the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來指定內容類型，不會包含在列舉型別。You can use this method to specify a content type that is not included in the enumeration. 不過，TTS 引擎必須支援您指定的參數。However, the TTS engine must support the parameter that you specify.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AppendTextWithPronunciation (string textToSpeak, string pronunciation);
.method public hidebysig instance void AppendTextWithPronunciation(string textToSpeak, string pronunciation) cil managed
Public Sub AppendTextWithPronunciation (textToSpeak As String, pronunciation As String)

param.name: textToSpeak
param.span: 字串，包含使用某語言傳統字母之單字的書寫形式。

span.span: A string containing the written form of the word using the conventional alphabet for a language.

param.name: pronunciation
param.span: 字串，包含要從國際音標 (IPA) 讀出的音素。

span.span: A string containing phones to be spoken from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).

summary.span: 將文字附加至 物件，並指定文字的發音。

span.span: Appends text to the object and specifies the pronunciation for the text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 合成器說出的內容`pronunciation`參數，而非內容的`textToSpeak`參數。The synthesizer speaks the contents of the `pronunciation` parameter, not the contents of the `textToSpeak` parameter. 發音以內嵌方式指定在提示中的只會套用到個別次出現的文字，並覆寫語音引擎或其目前作用中 lexicon 除外的任何發音。Pronunciations specified inline in prompts apply only to the individual occurrence of a word and override pronunciations of the speech engine or any of its currently active lexicons. 一般而言，您將使用內嵌發音自訂的現有文字的發音或不常見的詞彙，例如適當的名稱，其中的語音合成引擎可能不讀出，以及預期的發音。Typically, you will use inline pronunciations for custom pronunciations of existing words or for pronunciation of uncommon words, such as proper names, which the speech synthesis engine may not pronounce as well as expected. 必須使用電話從國際音標 (IPA) 來指定內嵌發音。Inline pronunciations must be specified using phones from the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA). 字母或字元，表示個別音效的語音電話。A phone is a letter or character that represents a discreet sound of speech. 符合的語音引擎[語音合成標記語言 (SSML) 1.0 版](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763)規格會讀出 IPA 從手機。Speech engines that comply with the [Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201763) specification will pronounce phones from the IPA. 若要指定內嵌發音使用其他注音字母，請參閱。To specify inline pronunciations using other phonetic alphabets, see . IPA 發行[圖表](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362)，列出其電話，並將之對應至 Unicode 的數字。The IPA publishes a [chart](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=58362) that lists its phones and maps them to Unicode numbers. IPA 字母中的某些電話有英文字母轉換成相同的表示法。Some phones in the IPA alphabet have the same representations as letters in the Latin alphabet. 在這些情況下，可能會輸入拉丁字元，並具有適當的表示法的電話。In those cases, it is possible to type the Latin character and have the proper representation for a phone. 常用文字中的拉丁字元可能代表 IPA 電話集的數個電話，因為只需輸入的拉丁字元可能會導致需要精確 IPA 電話。Because the Latin characters as commonly used in text may represent several phones of the IPA phone set, simply typing the Latin character might not result in the precise IPA phone desired. IPA 字母需求，而無法表示為程式碼中的其他電話字元參考包含連字號 (&)、 數字符號 （#），且所有後面接分號 （;） 所需的電話以十六進位或十進位、 Unicode 數字。Other phones of the IPA alphabet need to be represented in code as character references consisting of an ampersand (&), the number sign (#), and a Unicode number for the desired phone in hexadecimal or decimal, all followed by a semicolon (;). 例如，schwa (（& s)\#x0259;) 表示`ə`。For example, a schwa (&\#x0259;) would be represented by `ə`. 若要加入新的或自訂發音多個字，例如以 express 地區方言，或是將適當的名稱或特定教育或醫療專業領域的詞彙，建置詞典 」，並將它加入使用。To add new or custom pronunciations for multiple words, for example to express regional dialects or to add proper names or vocabulary that is specific to an educational or medical discipline, build a lexicon and add it to the using . ## Examples 下列範例會初始化的新執行個體類別。The following example initializes a new instance of the class. 然後附加文字字串 「 我的名字 」 執行個體。It then appends the text string "My name is" to the instance. 最後，它會附加字串，包含正確名稱 」 DuBois 」，並指定發音的名稱。Finally, it appends a string containing the proper name "DuBois" and specifies the pronunciation of the name. ```csharp public void ProperName() { PromptBuilder builder = new PromptBuilder(); builder.AppendText("My name is"); // Add a proper name and its pronunciation. builder.AppendTextWithPronunciation("DuBois", "duˈbwɑ"); } ``` 下列標記顯示 SSML 這個物件產生。The following markup shows the SSML that this object generates. ```xml My name is DuBois ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearContent() cil managed

summary.span: 從 物件清除內容。

span.span: Clears the content from the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); void set(System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的文化特性資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets the culture information for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件將嘗試選取支援所指定的語言已安裝的語音處理提示的屬性。The object will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the property to process the prompt. 如果找到具有指定之文化特性的語音，它會使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到與指定的文化特性的語音，就會使用預設語音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 也可能不同區段的內容使用提示字元中指定的文化特性， ，和方法。A culture may also be specified within the prompt for discreet sections of content using the , , and methods. 指定的內容使用上述方法之一的部分將會覆寫的文化特性屬性時作用中，而將嘗試選取支援所指定的語言已安裝的語音`culture`這個方法的參數。A culture specified for a portion of content using one of the above methods will override the property while in effect, and the will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter of the method. 若要正確讀出中所指定的語言的字語音合成 （語音或 TTS） 引擎，支援的語言 屬性，必須先安裝。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the property, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安裝的 TTS 引擎會呼叫語音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要取得特定文化特性語音已安裝相關的資訊，請使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼的值為`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 隨附於 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支援下列語言的國家/地區代碼：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英文 （美國）English (United States) - zh-chs 和 CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中國）Chinese (China) - zh-chs 和 TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台灣）Chinese (Taiwan) 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted. 請參閱[語言識別項常數和字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd318693\(VS.85\).aspx)如需完整的語言代碼清單。See [Language Identifier Constants and Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd318693\(VS.85\).aspx) for a comprehensive list of language codes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndParagraph() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 物件中的段落結尾。

span.span: Specifies the end of a paragraph in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 長的提示時，可以轉譯更像人類的語音它們分解為句子與段落。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 如需範例，請參閱 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndSentence() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 物件中的句子結尾。

span.span: Specifies the end of a sentence in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 長的提示時，可以轉譯更像人類的語音它們分解為句子與段落。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. 如需範例，請參閱 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndStyle() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 物件中的樣式結尾。

span.span: Specifies the end of a style in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會停止目前的講話樣式。The method stops the current speaking style. 講話樣式會還原為作用中之前已設定方法起始新的講話樣式。The speaking style reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new speaking style. 如需範例，請參閱 。See for an example.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndVoice() cil managed

summary.span: 指定 物件中的語音使用結尾。

span.span: Specifies the end of use of a voice in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會停止目前的語音使用語音輸出。The method stops the use of the current voice for speech output. 語音會還原為作用中之前已設定方法起始新的語音。The voice reverts to the setting that was in effect before the method initiated a new voice.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEmpty As Boolean

summary.span: 取得 是否為空的。

span.span: Gets whether the is empty.

summary.span: 指定 物件中的段落開頭，並選擇性地指定語言。

span.span: Specifies the start of a paragraph in the object, and optionally specifies a language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 長的提示時，可以轉譯更像人類的語音它們分解為句子與段落。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartParagraph(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供特定文化特性的相關資訊，例如語言、文化特性的名稱、書寫系統、使用的行事曆，以及如何格式化日期和排序字串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as the language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 指定 物件中指定文化特性的段落開頭。

span.span: Specifies the start of a paragraph in the specified culture in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 長的提示時，可以轉譯更像人類的語音它們分解為句子與段落。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture`段落的參數可能會不同於屬性包含它的物件。The `culture` parameter for a paragraph can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 作用中，而值`culture`參數會覆寫屬性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 將嘗試選取支援所指定的語言已安裝的語音`culture`說話段落的參數。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the paragraph. 如果找到具有指定之文化特性的語音，它會使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到與指定的文化特性的語音，就會使用預設語音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用所指定的語音，呼叫。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要正確讀出中所指定的語言的字`culture`必須安裝參數，語音合成 （語音或 TTS） 引擎，支援的語言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安裝的 TTS 引擎會呼叫語音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要取得特定文化特性語音已安裝相關的資訊，請使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼的值為`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 隨附於 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支援下列語言的國家/地區代碼：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英文 （美國）English (United States) - zh-chs 和 CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中國）Chinese (China) - zh-chs 和 TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台灣）Chinese (Taiwan) 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

summary.span: 指定 物件中的句子開頭，並選擇性地指定語言。

param.span: 提供特定文化特性的相關資訊，例如語言、文化特性的名稱、書寫系統、使用的行事曆，以及如何格式化日期和排序字串。

summary.span: 指定 物件中指定文化特性的句子開頭。

span.span: Specifies the start of a sentence in the specified culture in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 長的提示時，可以轉譯更像人類的語音它們分解為句子與段落。Long prompts can be rendered more like human speech if they are broken into sentences and paragraphs. `culture`句子參數可能會不同於`culture`參數包含句子的段落或屬性物件，其中包含它們。The `culture` parameter for a sentence can be different than the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence or the property of the object that contains them. 作用中，而值`culture`參數會覆寫屬性和`culture`參數包含句子的段落。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property and the `culture` parameter for the paragraph that contains the sentence. 將嘗試選取支援所指定的語言已安裝的語音`culture`說話句子的參數。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the sentence. 如果找到具有指定之文化特性的語音，它會使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到與指定的文化特性的語音，就會使用預設語音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用所指定的語音，呼叫。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要正確讀出中所指定的語言的字`culture`必須安裝參數，語音合成 （語音或 TTS） 引擎，支援的語言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安裝的 TTS 引擎會呼叫語音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要取得特定文化特性語音已安裝相關的資訊，請使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼的值為`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 隨附於 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支援下列語言的國家/地區代碼：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英文 （美國）English (United States) - zh-chs 和 CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中國）Chinese (China) - zh-chs 和 TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台灣）Chinese (Taiwan) 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartStyle(class System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptStyle style) cil managed

param.name: style
param.span: 要起始的樣式。

span.span: The style to start.

summary.span: 指定 物件中的樣式開頭。

span.span: Specifies the start of a style in the object.

summary.span: 指示合成器變更 物件中的語音。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語音表示已安裝的 TTS 引擎。A voice represents an installed TTS engine. 使用方法和類別取得的名稱和屬性的安裝，您可以選取文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 當應用程式呼叫，此方法會驗證每個在登錄中找到的語音符合某些最小的準則。When an application calls , the method verifies that each of the voices it finds in the registry meets certain minimum criteria. 無法驗證任何語音設定其屬性`False`。For any voice that fails verification, sets its property to `False`. 應用程式無法呼叫任何方法上的語音其屬性是`False`。An application cannot call any of the methods on a voice whose property is `False`. 一般而言，應用程式將不會設定語音屬性。Typically, applications will not set a voice’s property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void StartVoice(class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

param.name: culture
param.span: 提供特定文化特性的相關資訊，例如語言、文化特性的名稱、書寫系統、使用的行事曆，以及如何格式化日期和排序字串。

span.span: Provides information about a specific culture, such as the language, the name of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.

summary.span: 指示合成器變更 物件中的語音，並指定要使用之語音的文化特性。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in the object and specifies the culture of the voice to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `culture`參數可能會不同於屬性包含它的物件。The `culture` parameter for can be different than the property of the object that contains it. 作用中，而值`culture`參數會覆寫屬性。While in effect, the value of the `culture` parameter will override the property. 將嘗試選取支援所指定的語言已安裝的語音`culture`說出內容加上參數和。The will attempt to select an installed voice that supports the language specified by the `culture` parameter to speak the content enclosed by and . 如果找到具有指定之文化特性的語音，它會使用它。If a voice with the specified culture is found, it will be used. 如果找不到與指定的文化特性的語音，就會使用預設語音。If a voice with the specified culture cannot be found, the default voice will be used. 若要停止使用所指定的語音，呼叫。To stop using the voice specified by , call . 若要正確讀出中所指定的語言的字`culture`必須安裝參數，語音合成 （語音或 TTS） 引擎，支援的語言。To correctly pronounce words in the language specified by the `culture` parameter, a speech synthesis (text-to-speech or TTS) engine that supports the language must be installed. 已安裝的 TTS 引擎會呼叫語音。An installed TTS engine is called a voice. 若要取得特定文化特性語音已安裝相關的資訊，請使用方法。To get information about which voices are installed for a specific culture, use the method. Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼的值為`culture`。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes as values for `culture`. 隨附於 Windows 7 的 TTS 引擎支援下列語言的國家/地區代碼：The TTS engines that shipped with Windows 7 support the following language-country codes: - EN-US。en-US. 英文 （美國）English (United States) - zh-chs 和 CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中國）Chinese (China) - zh-chs 和 TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台灣）Chinese (Taiwan) 也允許兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en-us"。Two-letter language codes such as "en" are also permitted.

MemberSignature.Value: public void StartVoice (System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceGender gender, System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceAge age, int voiceAlternate);
.method public hidebysig instance void StartVoice(valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceGender gender, valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceAge age, int32 voiceAlternate) cil managed
Public Sub StartVoice (gender As VoiceGender, age As VoiceAge, voiceAlternate As Integer)
public: void StartVoice(System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceGender gender, System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceAge age, int voiceAlternate);

param.name: gender
param.span: 要使用之語音的性別。

span.span: The gender of the voice to use.

param.name: age
param.span: 要使用之語音的年齡。

span.span: The age of the voice to use.

param.name: voiceAlternate
param.span: 整數，當一個以上的語音符合 gender 和 age 參數時，這個整數會指定慣用語音。

span.span: An integer that specifies a preferred voice when more than one voice matches the gender and age parameters.

summary.span: 指示合成器變更 物件中的語音，並指定其性別、年齡，以及符合指定性別和年齡的慣用語音。

span.span: Instructs the synthesizer to change the voice in the object and specifies its gender, age, and a preferred voice that matches the specified gender and age.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語音合成引擎會計算的符合項目它尋找指定的參數，並傳回語音，當計數等於`voiceAlternate`參數。A speech synthesis engine counts the matches it finds for the specified parameters, and returns the voice when the count equals the `voiceAlternate` parameter. 使用方法和類別取得的名稱和屬性的安裝，您可以選取文字轉換語音 (TTS) 語音。Use the methods and class to obtain the names and attributes of installed text-to-speech (TTS) voices that you can select. 若要停止使用所指定的語音呼叫。To stop using the voice specified by call .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string ToXml() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回從 物件所產生的 SSML。

span.span: Returns the SSML generated from the object.

returns.span: 以單行形式傳回 物件所產生的 SSML。

span.span: Returns the SSML generated from the object as a single line.
